about_the_game:
It is a dynamic pixel style shooting game that focuses on fast-paced survival challenges and intense battles against endless zombie waves. The game adopts retro pixel art design, with full color graphics and strong visual impact.

In the game, players will play the role of brave survivors, holding various classic firearms, and engage in a life and death battle with a surging army of zombies. The shooting feel is solid, and the feedback from the head popping is refreshing. Coupled with the tense and stimulating background music and the real sound effects of zombie roars, it creates a combat experience that is immersive. Not only that, as the game progresses, players also need to strategically upgrade their equipment and cleverly use environmental layout to kill enemies in order to gain a glimmer of vitality in the zombie frenzy.
